text: Berdyshevo () is a rural locality (a selo) in Polozovoskoye Rural Settlement, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 319 as of 2010. There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located 5 km south-east from Polozovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Berdyshevo
